prompt:
Task: For each ingredient, choose the best Woolworths SKU (from candidates) and suggest how many retail packs are needed.
        Use servings + archetype context to keep quantities realistic. If candidates are provided, you MUST choose one of them (even if it slightly overshoots quantity) and justify the pick—never return null when at least one candidate exists.
        Only when no candidates are supplied may you set `selected_product_id` to null, and those notes must begin with `MISSING_SKU:` so the pipeline can flag the meal for removal.
        Do NOT rewrite the instructions or mention retailer names in the method; only provide product matches.

        Archetype snapshot:
        ```json
        {
  "uid": "arch_AFQB_2025_01",
  "name": "Family AirFryer Quick Bites",
  "core_tags": {
    "DietaryRestrictions": [
      "None"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "American",
      "Mexican"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "Under15"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Mild"
    ],
    "Equipment": [
      "AirFryer",
      "Microwave"
    ],

      "SemiPrepared"
    ],
    "NutritionFocus": [
      "NoNutritionFocus"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "None"
    ]
  }
}
        ```

        Meal draft:
        ```json
        {
  "name": "Air Fryer Nugget Taco Wraps",
  "description": "Crispy chicken nuggets tucked into soft tortillas with cool toppings. Quick, kid-friendly wraps built for the air fryer and microwave.",
  "servings": "Serves 4",
  "prep_steps": [
    "Preheat air fryer to 200°C/390°F for 2–3 minutes.",
    "Shred lettuce (2 cups).",
    "Slice avocado.",
    "Place tortillas on a microwave-safe plate and cover with a damp paper towel."
  ],
  "cook_steps": [
    "Air fry chicken nuggets in a single layer for 8–10 minutes, shaking halfway, until hot and crisp.",
    "Microwave tortillas for 20–30 seconds to warm.",
    "Lay out tortillas and add a handful of lettuce to each.",
    "Add 3–4 chicken nuggets per tortilla and sprinkle with cheddar cheese.",
    "Top with salsa, a spoon of sour cream, and avocado slices.",
    "Fold and serve immediately."
  ],
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "chicken nuggets",
      "quantity": "20–24 pieces",
      "preparation": "air fry from frozen or chilled as packed"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "tortillas",
      "quantity": "8 small"
    },
    {

      "quantity": "¾ cup"
    },
    {

    }
  ],

    ],

    ],

}
        ```

        Output schema:
        ```json
        {
  "product_matches": [

}
        ```
